title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - May 20 2020
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast - May 20 2020
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:


Mark Steyn fills in for Rush while he recuperates from prescheduled treatment. Iran locusts. Michigan floods. Mexico hail. We have flattened the economy. E.U. car sales down 77%. Pompeo’s dog. Susan Rice memo. Sidney Powell joins the program to discuss the Flynn case and corrupt Judge Emmet Sullivan. First person sentenced to death over Zoom in Singapore.


PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:


Susan Rice memo. Rush’s audience loves and supports small businesses. Salon owner calls to share her overreaching shutdown experience. MI police issuing haircut rules. Tea Party is now the Haircut Party. The media focused on Russia while China took over the world. The unmasking and masking of citizens. Comey is what’s gone wrong with the FBI.


PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:


Susan Rice says she wrote the memo at the direction of the White House counsel. Steyn plays Rush clip on why Obama won’t be prosecuted over the Russian collusion scandal, caller weighs in. The economic repercussions of the lockdown. NJ gov tweet telling people to get used to it (the restrictions). Caller brings up the Dreyfus Affair and how Judge Sullivan will corrupt the entire federal judicial system.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
